title: My computer fan is "whirring" please help lol
body:
Hi all, today I downloaded CS:GO and I played just for a short while. I noticed that my laptop fan was making a noise that Ive never heard before. As in, it never happened while I played League but it started doing it as soon as I started playing CS:GO it started to make a "whirring" sound like it was overheating, but it didnt feel any hotter than when I played League. If anyone knows a solution or if this could potentially hard my computer please lmk in the comments. If you need anymore information about my computer or whatnot feel free to ask

Thanks!

P.S. Yes I KNOW CS:GO isnt LoL related, but this is the best place I could expect a fast response. If i broke a rule or something please let me know and I will take it down

EDIT: Thank you for the responses! :D
